UART1:

open /dev/mem
map 0x48022000 0xfff
md 0 0x60
00000000: 00000000 00000000 00000001 00000003 ................
00000010: 00000000 00000060 000000f0 00000000 ....`...........
00000020: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 ................
00000030: 00000020 00000008 00000040 00000000  .......@.......
00000040: 00000000 00000004 00000000 00000000 ................
00000050: 50412603 0000001d 00000001 000000ff .&AP............

map 0x44E09000 0xfff
md 0 0x60
00000000: 00000041 00000005 000000c1 00000013 A...............
00000010: 0000000b 00000000 00000030 00000000 ........0.......
00000020: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 ................
00000030: 00000004 00000001 00000040 00000000 ........@.......
00000040: 00000080 00000004 00000000 00000000 ................
00000050: 50412603 0000000d 00000001 000000ff .&AP............


For DCAN0 clocks (and other clocks too along the way):
->open /dev/mem
->map 0x44E00000 0xfff
mapping offset 0x44e00000 (size 0xfff)
->md 0 0xC4
00000000: 00004d02 0000000a 00000101 00000056 .M..........V...
